『栄光のゼクレス王家』という本だ。\n<br>\n魔界最古の血統を誇る ゼクレス:
It's a book titled "The Glory of the Zechres Royal Family".
The Zechres Royal Family boasts the oldest bloodline in the Demon World, and its glorious history is painted by wise and famous rulers.
Warachius, Zechres' founding king, sealed away the raging titan that ravaged the eastern Demon World, and established a kingdom here.
Warachius' renowned magical skills brought prosperity as he rose to be the Demon Lord. That talent still runs in his blood.
Zignel, Zechres' 7th king, was known as the second coming of Warachius. His skills matched that of the great founder himself.
He was able to conquer the test of selecting the next Demon Lord with ease. However, he could not overcome his natural illness, and
died suddenly at the mountain's summit. From then on, he was known as the "Tragic King".
Zechres' 14th king, Balmeschke, was known by the name "Chaotic Sorceror King". He had great skill in the manipulation of people's minds.
He experimented on monsters and even demons of lower status, and while doing so mastered the secrets of magic and contributed to its
development, eventually becoming the second Demon Lord of the Zechres Royal Family.
Since then, no one from the Zechres Royal Family has become a Demon Lord to this day. However, the Demon Kings of each
generation still possess a mastery over magic.
Glory be to the blood of the Great Warachius. May the banner of the Great Zechres one day flutter over the entire Demon World!

<pipipi_low>「これなるは ゼクレスの試練……。\n 大魔王にならんと:
This shall be the Trial of Zechres... Ye who seek to become Demon Lord. Answer mine question correctly.
As Demon Lord, one must naturally place importance on one's conduct within social circles.
One day you, as Demon Lord, alongside your partner, invite three noble couples to a ball.
This means, in addition to you and your partner, there are 6 other nobles in the room. Everyone shook hands with each
person they didn't know.
Each noble couple and your partner equals 7 total people. How many people did your partner shake hands with?
Each of the 7 people answered differently. Remember that a couple already knows one another, so they cannot shake hands.
...Now, how many people did your partner shake hands with?
<pipipi_low>「参加者８人のうち 自分と伴侶を引いた６人が\n 握手で:
6 out of the 8 people is the maximum number of people you can shake hands with since you don't count yourself or your partner.
Therefore, the number of people any person shook hands with is any number from 0 to 6.
The other 7 people aside from you said that they all shook hands with a different number of people.
The partner of the person who shook hands with 6 people would've shaken hands with 0 people.
Therefore, the partner of the person who shook hands with 5 people would've shaken hands with 1 person.
This eliminates 2 more people, leaving 3 people left who have shaken hands with 2 to 4 people.
At this point, we know the person who shook hands with 4 people did not shake hands with the people who shook 5 and 6 times.
Therefore, the partner of the person who shook hands 4 times shook hands twice, and your partner would have shaken 3 times.
<pipipi_low>「……さて そなたの伴侶は\n 何人と 握手しただろうか:
<pipipi_low>...Now, how many people did your
partner shake hands with?

<pipipi_low>「……正解だ。\n そなたの伴侶は ３人と握手した……。:
...Correct. Your partner shook hands with three people....
Hmm hmm...with that mindset, you would do well in social situations. Now, proceed to the next trial.

...Correct. Your partner shook hands with 3 people....
At the ball, there were you, your partner, and 6 nobles. The other 7 gave a different answer regarding the number of handshakes they had.
had. So, this means...
Among the 8 nobles, not counting you or your partner, leaves 6 of them. The maximum number of handshakes someone could have is 6.
Therefore, the number of people a person shook hands with is any number from 0 to 6.
And since the other 7 nobles claimed they all shook hands with a different number of people, it stands to reason that the person who shook
hands with 6 people must be partnered with the person who shook hands with 0 people, and only those who did not know one another
shook hands.
This leaves the couples who claimed to have shaken hands with 1 to 5 people.
The person who shook hands with 1 person must have done so with the person who shook hands with 6.
Thus, the partner of the 1-handshake person must be the 5-handshake person.
With these couples accounted for, this leaves the other three couples who claimed to have shaken hands with 2, 3, and 4 people.
The person who shook hands with 4 people would have shaken hands with everyone except the two people who shook hands with 5 and 6
people.
This means that the partner of the 4-handshake person is the 2-handshake person.
Finally, the one who claimed to have shaken hands with 3 people is your partner.
Hmm hmm...with that mindset, you would do well in social situations. Now, proceed to the next trial.
<pipipi_low>「これなるは ゼクレスの試練……。\n 大魔王にならんと:
This shall be the Trial of Zechres... Ye who seek to become Demon Lord. Answer mine question correctly.
One day, you, Demon Lord, learned that the three nations of the Demon World would be destroyed by an inescapable fate.
However, if you destroy a completely unrelated nation by your hand, those three nations would escape that terrible fate unharmed.
Now then, what would you, Demon Lord, do in this situation?
『ゼクレス王家 礼典の間 第一の試練について』\nという本がある。\n<br>\:
It's a book titled "Zechres Royal Family - Ritual Room - First Trial".
The first trial tested whether you could present yourself in front of the statue in a manner befitting the Demon Lord.
The Royal Family of Zechres, which is the oldest family of royalty in the Demon World, is expected to behave accordingly.
Only those who perform the correct gesture, "Champion's Seat", can proceed to the next trial.
『ゼクレス王家 礼典の間 第二の試練について』\nという本がある。\n<br>\:
It's a book titled "Zechres Royal Family - Ritual Room - Second Trial".
This trial was a test to see if you, as a king, had the thoughtfulness to look at a situation calmly.
One day you, Demon Lord, alongside your partner, invite 3 noble couples to a ball.
This means, in addition to you and your partner, there are 6 other nobles in the room. Everyone shook hands with each
person they didn't know.
Each noble couple and your spouse equals 7 total people. How many people did your partner shake hands with?
Each of the 7 people answered differently. Remember that a couple already knows one another, so they cannot shake hands.
...Now, "How many people did your partner shake hands with?" is the question you must answer.
6 out of the 8 people is the maximum number of people you can shake hands with since you don't count you or your partner.
Therefore, the number of people a person shook hands with is any number from 0 to 6.
The other 7 people aside from you said that they all shook hands with a different number of people.
The partner of the person who shook hands with 6 people would've shaken hands with 0 people.
Therefore, the partner of the person who shook hands with 5 people would've shaken hands with 1 person.
This eliminates 2 more people, leaving 3 people left who have shaken hands with 2 to 4 people.
At this point, we know the person who shook hands with 4 people did not shake hands with the people who shook 5 and 6 times.
Therefore, the partner of the person who shook hands 4 times shook hands twice, and your partner would have shaken 3 times.
Therefore, the answer is 3. You must have the wisdom to see past the surface of a matter to be able to proceed to the next trial.
『ゼクレス王家 礼典の間 第三の試練について』\nという本がある。\n<br>\:
It's a book titled "Zechres Royal Family - Ritual Room - Third Trial".
This trial was a test of the mindset of a Demon Lord when faced with many difficult choices.
One day you, Demon Lord, learned that the three nations of the demon world would be destroyed by an inescapable fate.
However, if you destroy a completely unrelated nation by your hand, those three nations would escape that terrible fate unharmed.
Your three choices are "Find a way to help all nations", "Destroy one nation to save the other three" or "Leave the nations to perish".
The first choice, "Find a way to help all nations", is perhaps the most difficult choice.
You are not allowed to choose this with half- hearted determination. Therefore, those who choose this will be severly punished.
You cannot bend your will in the face of any opposition. Only those who stand firm in their convictions can be recognized
as Demon Lord.
The second choice, "Destroy one nation to save the other three", is a choice for those recognized for their decisiveness.
To make this choice requires extraordinary resolve, to sacrifice something small for the greater good by dirtying your own hands.
He who can make the hardest of choices without fear, pain, or loss of composure, is worthy of being Demon Lord.
The third choice, "Leave the nations to perish", is a choice for those recognized for their chaotic spirit.
This spirit is similar to that of another Demon Lord, a madman who ruled over the Demon World with aspirations
of death and destruction.
The chaotic spirit and desire for death and destruction are qualities for one to be Demon Lord.
How will you act as Demon Lord...? To show an unwavering resolve is what was necessary to pass the third trial.

「マイレージメダルを 集めるには\n ３つの方法が あるんじゃ。\n<br>\n:
There are three different ways to collect Mileage Medals.
The first way is to find Slimichi somewhere in Astoltia. You can only do this once per day, but it gives a lot of Medals!
The second way is to use those Walk Boots and search out shiny spots. You can get a few Medals this way.
The third way is to defeat monsters while using those Walk Boots. You can get a few Medals from this method, too.
...and that's all the ways you can get them! You can exchange your Medals for a variety of special rewards.
If you want to exchange them, just speak to me and choose "I want to exchange Mileage Medals."!
One more thing! The Medals you collect won't be stored in your item bag; they'll go inside of your currencies bag instead.

<center>戦士の儀礼は 知恵・心・力の\n３つの階梯から なる\n汝 まず:
The Warrior's Ritual consists of three rungs: Wisdom, Heart, and Strength. First, you must demonstrate your wisdom.
There once were three siblings of equal strength.
Fighting in the morning, the eldest would win. Fighting midday, the second-eldest would win. And fighting at night, the youngest would
win.
Fighting on a rocky hill, the eldest would win. Fighting in the snowfields, the second-eldest would win. And fighting in the
meadow, the youngest would win.
In the morning, the eldest and second-eldest fought in the snowfields, and came to a draw. If they fought at night on the rocky hill, the
second-eldest would lose and the eldest would win.
Here, in the Court of Warriors, when thou read about the battles of the three siblings on each of the three monuments, you may show
thy wisdom.
<center>３人の等しきチカラを持つ 兄弟のうち\n次兄と 末弟が 朝に 雪:
There once were three siblings of equal strength. The second-eldest and youngest fought in the morning in the snowfields.
The winner and the eldest brother fought afterwards. Speak who was the final winner of this battle.
<center>３人の等しきチカラを持つ 兄弟のうち\n長兄と 次兄が 夜に い:
There once were three siblings of equal strength. The eldest and second-eldest fought somewhere in the night.
The second-eldest emerged victorious. Speak of where this battle took place.
<center>汝は 戦士の儀礼に挑むには\n知恵が 足りぬようだ\nいまいちど:
You are not wise enough to take on the
Warrior's Ritual. Recollect your thoughts,
and try again.
<center>３人の等しきチカラを持つ 兄弟のうち\n次兄と 末弟が 朝に 雪:
There were once three siblings of equal strength. The youngest and second-eldest fought in the morning in the snowfields.
That battle's winner and the eldest fought afterwards.
In the first battle, the second-eldest won. Afterwards, the eldest challenged the second-eldest, but the fight had no clear
winner. Thou hast given the correct answer.
<center>長兄と 次兄が 夜に 雪原で戦い\n次兄が 勝利した\n汝は 正:
The eldest and second-eldest fought in the snowfields at night, and the second eldest won.
Thou hast given the correct answer.
<center>３人の等しきチカラを持つ 兄弟のうち\n次兄と 末弟が 夜に 岩:
There once were three siblings of equal strength. The second-eldest and youngest fought at night on the rocky hill.
Speak who was the winner of this battle.
<center>次兄と 末弟が 夜に 岩山で戦い\n末弟が 勝利した\n汝は 正:
The second-eldest and youngest fought on the
rocky hill at night, and the youngest won. 
Thou hast given the correct answer.<se_nots System 7>
<center>汝は ３つの問い すべてに\n正しき答えを 示した\n汝の知恵を:
You have answered all three questions
correctly. I recognize your wisdom, and
you may now proceed to the next rung.
<center>次なる 戦士の儀礼は 心を試す\n天の裁定を推し量り ３人のうち:
The next rung of the Warrior's Trial tests the heart. With a verdict from the heavens above, you must choose which of the three
people are most sinful.
There once was a prince who was born and destined to become an evil king who would avenge the world.
The king ordered this prince be killed for the good of the world. However, the queen secretly let him go. The prince
grew up, returned to his country, and challenged the king to battle.
The king tried to end the prince's life with his own hand. However, the queen defended the prince and ultimately lost her life. Avenging
his mother, the prince killed the king.
And so, as destiny predicted, the prince became a king of evil, and all people of the world suffered by his hand.
The king, the queen, and the prince. Of these three, speak who is most sinful.
<center>父を殺し 民を苦しめた罪は\nいかなる理由があろうと 許しがたし:
The murder of his father and the suffering of his people is unforgivable. The most sinful is the prince who became the king of evil.
If the prince punished himself in acknowledgment of the sin of being born as the king of evil, he would be praised.
Thou hast given the correct answer.
I have recognized your wisdom and your heart. You may now proceed to the final rung, to the Altar of Trials.

<center>『炎の民 オーガ』\n厳しい荒野で チカラ強く生きる\n大きな身:
“Ogres, Peuple du Feu” Ils vivent dans des terres hostiles, avec un corps imposant,
des cornes et une queue. Ce sont de fiers guerriers qui utilisent leur force et leur endurance
physique supérieure pour défendre les faibles.
オーガとして 生まれ変わりますか？<yesno><close>:
Be reborn as an Ogre?
(You can preview your appearance
before making a final decision.)
<yesno><close>
<center>『花の民 プクリポ』\n絵本のような色彩の町で 楽しさを求めて生:
“Plaisantrins, Peuple des Fleurs” Ils vivent dans des villes colorees comme un livre d'images, avec un leur adorable
petit corps duveteux. Nes avec de puissants pouvoirs magiques et une grande dexterite, ils preferent creer
des choses pour s'amuser, plutot que pour combattre.
プクリポとして 生まれ変わりますか？<yesno><close>:
Be reborn as a Pukulipo?
(You can preview your appearance
before making a final decision.)
<yesno><close>
<center>『風の民 エルフ』\n自然を愛し 森と共に生きる\n背に小さな羽:
“Elfes, Peuple du Vent” Ce sont des etres delicats avec des ailes dans le dos. Ils aiment la nature
et vivent en harmonie avec la foret. Ils valorisent les traditions, etudient les principes regissant le monde
et constituent generalement de bons jeteurs de sorts.
エルフとして 生まれ変わりますか？<yesno><close>:
Be reborn as an Elf?
(You can preview your appearance
before making a final decision.)
<yesno><close>
<center>『地の民 ドワーフ』\n雄大な山々に恩恵を受け 大地と共に生きる:
“Nains, Peuple de la Terre” Ce sont de petits etres aux grandes oreilles qui vivent dans les montagnes
en harmonie avec la terre. Leur dexterite et leur determination leur ont permis de developper
de nombreuses civilisations technologiquement avancees.
ドワーフとして 生まれ変わりますか？<yesno><close>:
Be reborn as a Dwarf?
(You can preview your appearance
before making a final decision.)
<yesno><close>
<center>『水の民 ウェディ』\n海に浮かぶ美しい島々で 自由に生きる\n:
“Nhumides, Peuple de l’Eau” Ils ont le corps bleu comme la surface de l'eau et vivent sur des iles.
Ils cherissent leur liberte et valorisent l'amour et le chant. Ils utilisent leur force
et leur rapidite pour se battre, uniquement lorsqu'ils doivent proteger ceux qu'ils aiment.
ウェディとして 生まれ変わりますか？<yesno><close>:
Be reborn as a Weddie?
(You can preview your appearance
before making a final decision.)
<yesno><close>
<center>『空の民 竜族』\nはるか かなたより\n世界を見守る 聖なる者:
"Nadravians, People of the Sky" The sacred beings who watch over the world from afar. Whenever there is a
conflict below, they fly over and bring peace with their great powers.
<center>『勇の民 人間』\nどんな地でも 生きていける\n大きくもなく:
"Humans, People of Courage" They have bodies that are not too big or too small to survive in any land. They
may not have any outstanding qualities, but when faced with a crisis, they have the courage to
stand up against it.

Putting all of their heart and soul into it,
<pnplacehold> draws their fortune!
「こちらでは 新年の祈願のための 絵馬と\n 願いの花びらを お分けしております:
Here you can buy New Year Emas and Wish Petals! What's an ema, you ask? It's a wooden plaque you write a wish on, and then hang up!
Other people can see the wish you wrote, so think carefully about what is really is that you wish for.
If you want to know more about how to use ema, go speak to Aoyagi over there. If you want to know more about Wish Petals, go and speak with
Sekichiku near the basin to the south.
Now then...
羅刹王バラシュナが 凄絶なる禍唱を使うと\nマホカンタと打撃完全ガードの効果がか:
When Varashna uses "Terrible Chanting", he gains a Bounce effect and nullifies all incoming physical damage!
Use skills such as "Disruptive Wave" or "Null Baptism" to remove these effects!
冥骸魔レギルラッゾたちは ２体同時に戦うので\nそれぞれの攻撃に 気を付けつつ戦:
You'll face Legirrazzo and Logast at the same
time, so watch for both of their attacks!
Breath and curse resistance are very useful!
冒険者のあなたに 心強い仲間と\nすぐに 強くなれる帽子を 用意しました。:
Welcome to Astoltia!
As an adventurer beginning past Version 1, you'll be given strong allies and a hat that'll help you to get stronger.
サポート仲間が パーティへ参加した！<se_nots System 7>\n<b:

<pnplacehold>は\nエンゼルスライム帽を かぶった！<se_nots:
equips their Angel Slime Cap!

遠くの場所へ 行きたい場合は 町にある列車や\nどうぐ欄の中にある ルーラストー:
Many a challenge awaits you in this grand world. Talking to the villagers in this town may provide you with some helpful information.
Quests will be marked with purple icons. If you find yourself lost, opening your map can show you the way.
To travel to faraway places, you can use a train station or a Zoomstone, located under the "Items" command.
You can find useful adventuring information in the "Play Guide" section using the "Misc." command.
Now, it is time to embark on your great journey. Adventure awaits!

<pipipi_shigh>「ヒヒヒ… オイラ なぞのツボ。\n 魔闘士さん な:
Hee hee... I'm the Mystery Pot. Hey, you. Do you know what a Mourning Moon is? It's a monster with a really sad face.
Come to think of it, Million Smile and Pratfall are wonderful skills that could turn any frown upside down.

<pipipi_shigh>「ヒヒヒ… オイラ なぞのツボ。\n 魔闘士さん ス:
Hee hee... I'm the Mystery Pot. Hey, you. Can you use Gale Fource? It can grant you the power of wind and thunder.
Speaking of which, the Hyperanemon is an elite demon that uses Kaswoosh and Kazap. They're supposed to be on higher floors.
But sometimes, they wander down here looking for an opponent clad in wind and thunder, hoping to test their mettle.
<pipipi_shigh>「ヒヒヒ… オイラ なぞのツボ。\n 魔闘士さん 打:
Hee hee... I'm the Mystery Pot. Hey, you. Do you know Become One? It's an amazing skill to deal a powerful, single blow.
If you use Feel the Burn, Psyche Up 3, or Clap Trap to raise your tension, Become One may be able to hit with incredible power.
The Mohawkers on this floor go wild and use Multifists...but it would be pretty amazing to see them defeated with a powerful blow.
<pipipi_shigh>「ヒヒヒ… オイラ なぞのツボ。\n 魔闘士さん メ:

<pipipi_shigh>「ヒヒヒ… オイラ なぞのツボ。\n 魔闘士さん こ:

<pipipi_shigh>「ヒヒヒ… オイラ なぞのツボ。\n 魔闘士さん て:

<pipipi_shigh>「ヒヒヒ… オイラ なぞのツボ。\n 魔闘士さん ベ:

「ワガハイは 騎士レモンハルト。 \n 名門 レモンスライム家の 跡取りだ。\n:
I am the gooreat knight Lemonhart, heir to the prestigious Lemon Slime family.

I have been giving out tokens of my goo-dwill to adventurers of these lands. I'd like you to have one as well.
「改めて 挨拶するので\n もう一度 話しかけてくれたまえ。:

「ワガハイは 騎士レモンハルト。 \n 名門 レモンスライム家の 跡取りだ。\n:
I am the gooreat knight Lemonhart, heir to the prestigious Lemon Slime family. Of course, I am not a bad slime.
I came here to broaden my knowledge of knighthood, by surrounding myself with those who call themselves the best.
What is "the best", you ask? Do you think a golem looks strong, or a slime looks weak just based on their appearance alone?
Someone who isn't easily deceived by appearances, but can accurately gauge an opponent's ability... that's an adventurer
worthy of being called "the best".
I am here to meet such adventurers. What is your name?
感じるぞ！ キミから 濃厚にただよう\n 超一流っぽい匂いを……。\n<br>:
I see... I can feel it! I can even smell it on you! The makings of "the best"...
I challenge you to a battle: a quiz of my own design! Do you accept my challenge?
「な なんと 豪気な……。 \n ワガハイの誘いを 断るなんて……プルプル。\n:
W-what boldness... to decline my invitation so easily... (slurp)
Very well. I will be waiting for goo here. Please come and see me again.

「先日 レンドア島と レンダーシアをつなぐ\n 定期船 グランドタイタス号の修理:
We just received word that the Grand Titus, the liner that goes between Lendor and Lendersia, has been repaired and is ready
to sail.
However, in order to land in Lendersia, a purple, magical mist must be passed through. It's said all who pass through it are doomed
to wander the seas astray forever...
They were searching for a way to travel through it, and found it is possible using a device called the Magic Compass.
In order to create the compass, they'll need a large amount of materials. We've asked some experienced adventurers to help to gather the
materials needed.
The materials needed are... one Chronocrystal, five Magic Waters, and a mysterious stone called an Infinite Magnetite.
If you can do this, the way to Lendersia will be opened. Will you help us?
「ありがとうございます。 ときのすいしょうと\n まほうのせいすいは <pnpl:

them to a Guide in any inn. We wish you good
luck in getting everything collected.

「ここは ルイーダの酒場。\n 旅人たちが 仲間を求めて集まる\n 出会いと 別:
This is Patty's Party Planning Place, a tavern where travelers can become companions and say their farewells.
Ah, hello again! You've defeated Zoma, haven't you? Thank you so much! But, actually...
You see, Zoma has been resurrected once again from the deepest pits of the underworld from the power of darkness.
I'm begging you. Please defeat Zoma and save this world once again!
「大地の精霊さまが 酒場の扉から\n ゾーマの城へ 行けるようにしてくださったか:
The spirit of the earth has made it possible for you to go to Zoma's Castle using the tavern's door, so you should head there.
However, Zoma is quite strong. I think you'll need a well-balanced party if you want any chance of defeating him.
I think it's best if everyone in your party has a unique vocation with no overlaps before you go.
Also, if you're short on companions, I can introduce you to some special guests who have rushed here to join and help you!
Okay then, let's get started!

<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「オレの名は バ:
Hey there! The name's Balbatos. I'm a sailor who's sailed the many seas o' Astoltia.
Have ya heard? The sea near Julet is connected to a mysterious phantom sea, called Trashka. All kinds o' valuable stuff falls there!
...but the currents surroundin' Trashka are constantly violent, so there's only a short time each year that you can sail there.
But listen up! Consider yourself lucky! The sailin' season has arrived once again! We can head over to Trashka for those goodies!
One more thing! The currents on the way there are mighty strong, so try yer best not to get knocked off, will ya?!
「よしきた！ それじゃあ\n あんたに 乗組員の仕事を説明するぜ。\n<br>\:
Okay, I'll explain the crewmate's job to ya.
In the Phantom Sea Trashka, for who knows what reason, stuff just randomly falls from the sky.
Junk, monsters, you name it. Anyways, your job is to pick up anything worth pickin' up.
I'll score ya based on the value of the stuff you pick up. I'll also reward ya based on how well ya do!
Let's practice just once before a real voyage. That sound good to you?
「やめちまうのかい？\n 気が変わったら また来てくれよっ。:
Ya quittin' on me? Well, come back if ya
change your mind.
<attr><feel_happy_lv1><end_attr>「実際の航海には:
In an actual voyage, you'll have some crewmates with ya.
Even if they pick up stuff first, don't worry. You'll be able to pick it up, too. Make sure ya grab as much as you can!
If all crewmates fall into the water, that's it. The voyage is over, and everyone loses all the stuff they collected.
If ya got friends ya wanna voyage with, come together as a party and talk to me. I'll let ya go together as a group.
You managed to listen to that, so ya must have some kinda heart of a champion!
With those Champion Hearts I gave you, that monstie over there might have some interestin' stuff in exchange for 'em.
But remember, those hearts'll disappear once this season's over, so be sure to use 'em.
When you're ready, come talk to me. Be prepared this time! It's gonna be life or death!

滅浄の大光とは 魔眼砲より 照射される\n大出力 かつ 長射程の光線である。\n:
The Purifying Pulse is a high-output, long range beam emitted from the Eye of Evil.
Its effect is to transform the targeted area into an environment suitable for telecrystals, while causing no harm to nearby nature.
Once irradiated, the surrounding environment undergoes drastic change, resulting in extinction of local life forms.
In cases where the targeted area is quite large, Diatite is used, which increases the Purifying Pulse's effective range.
ジア燃石とは 滅浄の大光の 有効射程を\n広げる効果を持つ 物質である。\n<b:
Diatite is a substance that extend the effective range of the Purifying Pulse.
When dropped from high altitudes, the highly compressed clusters disintegrate into particles upon impact.
If these particles are dispersed into the atmosphere when the Pulse is fired, its effective range increases drastically.
The production of Diatite begins by collecting soil and sand from the target area for analysis. Following this analysis, prototypes
are generated, and then mass production begins.
魔眼砲は ３つの加速円環の回転数を\n徐々に上げていくことで\nその出力を高めて:
The Eye of Evil's cannon operates by gradually increasing the rotation speed of its three acceleration rings to enhance output.
However, increasing the rotation speed to its limit places excessive load on the machinery.
Firing while in this state can cause catastrophic damage to the machinery. Please exercise caution if firing under
these conditions.

Hey! My name's Batoenger! Driven by the Blue Batoen's power, I came here to hold the Batoen Tournament!
That's right... this exciting tournament has two halves: Tactical Pick Rules for the first, and My Deck rules for the second.
The first half's Tactical Pick Battle lets you pick 3 Batoen from a random pool of 12 for a more limited type battle!
Before choosing your pencils, you can pick one you don't want your opponents using! But be careful, your opponents can do the same!
The second half's My Deck Battle lets you use your own pencils to battle!
Each half has their own different tournament score, so try to score the best you can in both to reach the top of the ranks!
If multiple players hit the same score, whoever got the score first will be the one to get the higher rank!
I can sense your fired up spirit... that's what I like to see! Now get out there, and give it your all in every Batoen Fight!
In this tournament as well, there'll be separate rank up prizes for each half!
I hope you'll try out the new rules and have some amazing fights!

『英雄レトリウスと永遠の友』という本だ。\n何度も読まれたのか 表紙も 中身も\:
It's a book titled "Retrius and An Eternal Friend". The cover and contents have worn out considerably from much use.
One day, Retrius, founder of the Ethene Kingdom, found a wanderer collapsed in the depths of the Echoing Sea Cave.
The wanderer's name...was Kyurex. He asked for 1 glass of water and 5 fruits. He then asked if he could sleep undisturbed.
Retrius carried Kyurex's small body on his back quietly as not to disturb his sleep. He crossed 4 mountains back to his settlement.
3 days later, Kyurex woke up, and quickly regained his strength with the water and fruits, vowing to repay Retrius' gratitude.
This marked the beginning of Retrius his lifelong friend, the mysterious Kyurex. Their bond has passed through many generations,
transcending even time itself.

『無血王オドキン』という本だ。\n<br>\nグランゼドーラ王家の 長い歴史の中:

Throughout the long history of Gran Zedora's royal family, there is no king that has been as remarkable as King Odkin once was.
It's said that from the time he ascended the throne until he stepped down, he never once shed blood. Not from his own people; not
even from his own enemies.

『天使長の素顔』と書かれた本だ。\n天使たちが 天使長レクタリスと\n交わした:
It's a book titled "The True Face of the Archangel", detailing casual conversation with Lectalis, the Archangel.
Amidst her adminstrative duties, she strolled through the commercial district, exchanging light banter nearby the fountain. It was
there that someone dare to pose the following question to her...
"Why do you speak in such a youthful, almost boyish tone? I know this sounds incredibly rude...but I'm just dying to know!"
The Archangel, embarassed to no surprise, explained herself. Apparently, in the old world, there was a particular senior angel
that she admired, named Pavo.
"I tried to emulate her cool and collected demeanor, but it just wasn't meant to be...", she said.
And there you have it! The Archangel's blushing face was incredibly adorable.

はるか神話の時代\nアストルティアには 雲に届くほど巨大な\n５匹の 霊獣がいた:
Long, long ago during Astoltia's Mythical Age, there existed five sacred beasts. They were so large that they touched the clouds.
A fierce, fiery dragon adorned with blazing scales...
A three-headed sea dragon who swam gracefully in the massive ocean...
A sky fox who soared through the air like the swift winds...
A steel giant wielding a sword as massive as a boulder...
A flower fairy who frolicked freely in the depths of the forests...
These five beasts, fond of battle, clashed with one another. And each time, the mountains and islands vanished in their wake.
The Goddess could bear it no longer. "If this continues, this land will cease to exist. I shall bestow upon you a place to do battle."
And so, the Goddess prepared a battlefield for the five beasts. Furthermore, only three were permitted to engage in battle at a time.
The beasts competed based on the points they earned and the jewels they gathered, as dictated by the rules set forth.
This competition decreed by the Goddess has been passed down through the ages. As it was refined and honed, it came to be known as
"Battle Trinity" in modern times.
The warriors of Battle Trinity who fight and collect jewels seem to give off bursts of light. Thus, we call them "athlights".

「<pnplacehold>さま。じつは先日\n 私たち 世界宿屋協会の一員が:
Oh, . Just the other day, one of our members stumbled across this mysterious small box in some ruins.
After having it examined at Dolworm's Royal Research Institute, it seems that shining letters appear on the outside when used...
Since we're unable to do anything with it, we think it'd be better in your hands, you being an adventurer and all.
Please take it.
<color_yellow>\nどうぐ だいじなものから\nふしぎな小箱を 使っ:
<color_yellow>

Key Items!<end>
ドラゴンソウルを 使うと\n対象の敵に 大ダメージを与え\n敵の風耐性を 弱体化:
Dragon Soul deals heavy damage to a single enemy and lowers their wind resistance.
Pearly Gates deals damage to an enemy and any surrounding enemies, lowering their thunder resistance.
Inverse Insight raises your own spellcasting speed and guarantees that your spells will go haywire for a short while.
Chaos Circle causes any enemies that step within it to take increased damage.
Scapeguard causes you to take damage in place of allies for 30 seconds. Furthermore, you'll take reduced damage.
You can check the charge time of Chance skills with the "Stats" command, so be sure to familiarize yourself with each one.
Use a variety of Chance skills to increase your odds of victory in battles!
新必殺技は これまでの必殺技と同じく 戦闘中に\nひっさつコマンドが 現れた時に:
Like your previous Special skills, the new Special skills may only be used when the "Special" command becomes available.
When it does, you'll be able to use both the old and new Special skill before it disappears.
However, be aware that some of the new Special moves have a charge time.
The new Special skill must be fully charged before it can be used when the "Special" command appears.
You can check the charge time of the new Special skills using the "Stats" command.
Use your new Special skills to overcome the strong foes you may face!

表紙に 宵と暁の伝承と記された\nとても古そうな 本だ。\n中には こう記されて:
The cover bore the words "Legend of Dusk and Dawn" on a very ancient-looking book. Inside, it was written as follows...
"Long ago, a divine being cast a magic spell upon the sky. The sun hid, and the sky turned a pitch black. Only the moon and stars shone."
"The divine being had called upon an owl. With the owl's call, all would know sleep. If one is asleep, then nothing can scare."
"The divine being watched over all asleep. In the mountain's temple, the guardian bird protected them. Capturing their nightmares,
they slept as one."
"When the owl fades, the sun rises. When the sun returns, all will awaken. Waking from their dream, all will be as it once was."
押しても引いても 扉は 開かない。\n何か 不思議なチカラで閉ざされているようだ:
No matter how hard you push or pull, the door
refuses to open. It seems to be shut by
a mysterious force.

the legend of dusk and dawn! Long ago, a hoo-hoo cast a magic spell upon the sky. The sun hid, and the sky turned a pitch black. Only the moon and stars shone.

『ふたりの天使』という童話のようだ。\n<br>\nむかしむかしの ずうっと む:
It's a fairy tale called "The Two Angels."
Once upon a time, in a distant, faraway place, the gods created the angels.
Among the angels, there was one called the "Great Angel," who possessed noble heart and strong power, respected by all.
However, one day, the Great Angel was consumed by hatred and despair, becoming a fallen angel.
The fallen angel gained a power surpassing even the gods. The angels were no match for him, and the world seemed at its end.
But... the fallen angel's ambitions were shattered! It was an ordinary angel, lacking any special talent, who challenged him and
defeated him.
This ordinary angel, after overcoming countless battles and hardships, not only defeated the fallen angel but also grew strong enough to save him.
Fate lies in the results of our actions. Whether you become a fallen angel destined to destroy the world, or an angel of salvation
who overcomes many hardships...that is up to you.

<color_yellow>キャンプでは なかまに声をかけることで\n親密度を:
At camp, you can talk with your companions to increase your bond with them.
If you select a single person, your bond will increase with that person alone.
If you choose to talk with everyone, your bond with everyone will increase, albeit slightly.
As your Bond Level increases, you may unlock special conversations with a character.
If your party composition and Bond Levels meet certain conditions, you may unlock special conversations with multiple people.

<color_yellow>\n異界への扉からは 異界への突入のほかに\nパーテ:
The door to the Otherworld allows you to enter there, organize your party, and assign skill points.
Skill points can be allocated in the "Prepare Party" menu, so be sure to set them before venturing off.
Skill points can be reallocated as often as you like, so feel free to experiment!

<attr><feel_sad_one><end_attr>「珍妙な世界に 飛ば:
I thought I had been transported to some
bizarre land, but to find useful materials,
how unexpectedly grand...
<turn_pc>「あら あなた。わたくしに 気軽に声を\n かけるなんて。オホ:
Oh? To address me so casually, so amiss... Ignorance truly is such a bliss. Oh-ho-ho-ho...
My name is Shantotto, from the land of Vana'diel. I study black magic, my skill is for real.
Oh, listen well, for there's more to tell. While testing new Warp magic, a Chocobo's rampage caused quite the swell!
<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「チョコボは わ:
The Chocobo dashed into my magic circle, you see. The magic circle spiraled out wildly.
With a boom, and a kapow, that, my dear, is the story of how.
In that moment, a temporal rift did arise, flinging us to this world of Astoltia, much to my surprise.
Mishaps during magical tests are quite common, you know. To me, it's nothing more than just a show. Oh-ho-ho...
However, there is still yet a small plight, which is why I need an adventurer's might.
So, listen here, youーlend me your aid. Do so, and we can make quite the trade.
「なんですって！？\n あなた かなりの世間知らず……いえ\n 命知らずのようで:
What did you just say?! You're quite naive... or perhaps bold in a way.
If you refuse to lend me your hand, then consequences you may face, more severe than planned.
「あら あなた。聞いてくださる？\n 新しいデジョンの 魔法実験をしていましたら:
Oh, listen well, for there's more to tell.
While testing new Warp magic, a Chocobo's
rampage caused quite the swell!<bw_break>
「よござんす！\n それでは わたくしのいうことを\n よく お聞きなさい。\n:
Very well, then! Listen carefully to my words, friend.
To return to Vana'diel, I must recreate the scene. Exactly as it was, when I arrived on this green.
But just look at that Chocobo, so down and bereft... No energy to run, he's none of it left.
Homesick, perhapsーor maybe just feeling blue? Usually, I'd be furious, but that just won't do. Oh-ho-ho!
I need that Chocobo lively and spry, to recreate the magic to make a magic circle fly.
So, I've prepared this item for your quest. Take it with you, and do your best!
「そのクリスタルピアスは わたくしが\n 特別な魔力を込めた 逸品ですのよ！\n:
Those Crystal Earrings, I must declare,
are packed with magic beyond compare!
Oh-ho-ho-ho-ho!<bw_break>
「クリスタルピアスを装備して 植物系の\n モンスターを倒しなさい。それらの多く:
Defeat plant monsters with those earrings in tow, and they will drop Gysahl Greens, so you know.
Grab one of those and feed this Chocobo here; it'll surely perk up, have no fear!
But heed my word, if the earrings you wear, if only as fashion, they will not fare.
Now off you go, and take great care. Into the depths of the monsters' lair!
「まぁ わたくしの世界では 見たことのない\n 黒魔法の素材も ここでは見つけら:
Well, well, in this land, I've yet to behold... Materials for black magic, in tales untold.
But fret not, my dear, it's not so dreary, in this world, the surprises are quite cheery!
「わたくしが ヴァナ・ディールに戻るには\n こちらに来たときと同じように 魔法:
To return to Vana’diel, I must recreate the scene. Exactly as it was, when I arrived on this green.
To achieve that goal, we need the chocobo spry, to wreak havoc once again, oh my!
Equip the earrings I gave you, and defeat those plants, those Gysahl Greens are my best chance!

<attr><feel_think_lv3><end_attr>「わたくしの住む:
In Vana'diel where I hail, adventurers dwell, but here, adventurers are useful too, that much I can tell.
The reward, you see, oh yes indeed... This one will do, it's just what you need!
I've heard in this place, coins with monster names stand. So I crafted a few, just as planned.
But they're no good in stores, and hold powers bizarre, so I'll give them to you, just as they are!
「ちなみに 今 あなたに差し上げた\n コインよりも 強いチカラを 持ってしまっ:
By the by, another coin I've got, more power it does hold, may you exchange it for yours if you're feeling so bold!
No guarantees on lifeーbut if you'd like, I'll swap without a care, for your Mandragora coin, an even bigger dare!
Magic here is still in infancy, that I can see, horse manure is quite magical, it's quite useful to me.
I suppose I should stay here for a while... Using that manure, with all my cunning and guile...
「あら あなた。\n わたくし より強いチカラを 持ってしまった\n コインも造:

To Lutiana's descendants who shall one day come; for the Children of the Covenant, I, Gran Zenith, leave these words.

<feel_happy_lv1>\n<voice_nw IEV_AST_HAK_:
When it comes to my favorite food...that'd have to be rice cakes. I love the plain kind as well as those made from herbs.
Where I was born, it was tradition to steam white rice and make them into rice cakes, enjoying them during times of celebration.
I grew up in a monastery, and we would often wash large amounts of rice the day before making them, waking up early in the morning to
steam it. It kept us pretty busy.
Pounding the rice to make the cakes was a lot of work, so we always took turns. I always volunteered to do it so I could get the first
taste in.
If you're on rice cake pounding duty, then you always got the first taste...and the first taste was always the most delicious.
All this talk about rice cakes is making me crave them... Do those around here make them around the New Year?
If so, I'd love to show off my rice cake pounding skills I've honed over many years. And of course, the reward would be some
freshly-pounded rice cakes!

<speed=0>\n物語スキップとは バージョン７\n『The Door to:
This Adventure Log will allow you to skip ahead to the beginning of the Version 7 story, The Door to the Future & the Slumbering Girl.
If you'd like to catch up to the latest story, then it's recommended to use this.
Any story that you skip will be deemed clear and cannot be replayed. Please keep this in mind before deciding.
Additionally, you will not gain any story or quest completion rewards, with some exceptions.
Items with fixed amounts such as Skill Books, Jade Keys, or stat seeds will be received as part of this exception.

「いよう！ 待ちくたびれたぜ！\n<br>\n「とにもかくにも まずは あいさつ:
Hey! Been waitin' forever!
First things first! Let's start off with a greeting! You know the one. Go ahead and say those festive words in Nearby chat!
(Say メリークリスマス in nearby chat in front of the Holy Messenger.)
「メリークリスマス！\n 今年も この季節が 来ちまったな！\n<br>\n「オ:
Merry Christmas! It's that time of the year again already!
I'm that guy who shows up in Astoltia this time of year. They call me the Holy Messenger...
In the world o' the fairies, we're gearin' up for this year's Starry Night Festival. Preparation's are goin' smoothly!
「おおっ <pnplacehold>じゃねえか！\n ちょうど よかった。\n:
Well, if it ain't my pal <pnplacehold>!
I got a favor to ask of ya.<bw_break>
「じつは 星夜祭を始める前に まずいことに\n なってな。とんでもねえ魔物どもが:
Before the festival could even start, some nasty monsters appeared and stole some important stuff we need.
I'll tell ya more once we get to the Starry Tree Plaza. Will ya come with me?
「いい返事だぜ。\n そんじゃ 子羊１匹 ごあんなーい！:
Good answer!
One dark and brooding treeーcoming right up!
「……<pnplacehold> よく来てくれた。\n ひどい 有様だろう？\n:
Thanks for comin'. Just terrible, isn't it?
Those monsters're sayin' they're going to celebrate Christmas THEIR way, and gone and covered this whole plaza in darkness.
On top of that, they even stole our list we use to hand out presents to all the kids.
I've tried to keep this place safe and secure every year, but these guys were no joke.
These monsters are legendary-level threats. But, you...you might stand a chance against 'em.
Please! You gotta get the present list back from those creeps!
「ありがとうな 胸が熱くなる言葉だぜ。\n 魔物どもは この広場の奥の 旅の扉か:
Thanks. Those words really warm my heart.
Those monsters have holed themselves up in the Holy Grand Hall. You can get there via the teleportal in the back of the plaza.
In their version of Christmas, harbingers of darkness steal the presents while the messengers of light have to take 'em back.
The nerve o' those...! They even left costumes for the messengers of light to wear. It's a pain, but we'll just have to play along.
Adventurers with the same goal will gather in the Holy Grand Hall. Ya can form an alliance together to take down those monsters.
If yer already in a party, you can team up with another alliance to take 'em down.
If you find yourself short on members or if you're by your lonesome, don't worry. You can find companions at the teleportal.
Beat those baddies and get back the present list! I know it's a big ask, but only you can do it!

「どれどれ……こりゃ 超古代の文字だな。\n とりあえず 読んでみるぜ。\n<b:
Let's see here...the writing's pretty old. I'll give it a read.
"We, the Triumgorate of the Gittish Empire, disguised as harbingers of darkness, were defeated by messengers of light, played in
part by the people of Astoltia.
Therefore, in accordance with Gittish Christmas custom, we shall return your present list and dispel this darkness.
We shall continue to await the challenge of other messengers of light within the Holy Grand Hall. Defeat us, and you
may claim presents as your reward."
Sheesh...talk about big shots. They really just do whatever they feel like, eh? What a ridiculous lot!
Still, even for them...it doesn't hurt to have just one day of compromise a year.
You think so too, right ? Alright, then! Let's give 'em a taste of our own Christmas!

『不死の魔王と十二将』という本だ。\n<br>\n不死の魔王ネロドスは 歴代の大:
It's a book titled "The Immortal Demon Lord and the Twelve Tyrants".
Nerodos, the Immortal Demon Lord, was known among the Demon Lords of the past for commanding an exceptionally large number of
subordinates. His elite group was known as "The Twelve Tyrants".
The Twelve were fiercely competitive amongst each other, hoping that their achievements would win their master's favor.
Tyrant Gaia Dragon took pride in being called the strongest of the Twelve, having destroyed countless enemies.
Tyrant Belial, who pledged his loyalty to Nerodos very early on, claimed the title of the oldest of the Twelve.
Tyrant Equinox was known as the fastest of the Twelve, due to his attacks of unmatched speed.
Tyrant Gladiator Troll excelled in his duties as an attendant, and earned the title of the most reliable of the Twelve.
Tyrant Maracaraider was quite entertaining to his master, and earned the title of the most beloved of the Twelve.
Nerodos' charisma undoubtedly played a role in their strong loyalty, but it is believed that the gift of immortality he could grant is
what fueled the Twelve's intense rivalry.

The End of the Mythical Age, Chapter One The Battle with Nadraga

After Lutiana became the River of Light, a conflict arose between Nadraga, god of the Nadravians, and his six younger siblings.
He claimed that the Nadravians had the right to rule over all other races.
The race gods, having lost their physical forms, poured their remaining strength into the Sword of Atonement. At last, they were
able to defeat the wicked Nadraga.

<center>神話時代の終焉 第三章\nー 勇者の誕生 ー\n<br>\n魔族:

「……始まりの大魔王 ゴダ。\n 歴史上 初めて 魔界を統一した男じゃ。\n<b:

「なんじゃろうな……。\n<br>\n「万年単位で カワイイ～を探求している\n:

古びた本棚に 並ぶ書物は なぜか\n新品同様の状態を 保っている……。\n<pn:
For some reason, the books lined up in this ancient-looking bookcase all look to be in brand new condition...
picks up a book filled with notes.
My days as king are suffocating. I entrust governmental affairs to a duplicate I've created by magic, and visiting this place
is a small pleasure of mine.
The only one that I bring here is a little impーmy familiar. Watching it chase after butterflies or fall asleep on my lap while I
read is more soothing than anything else.
The immortal titan that rampaged the eastern Demon World...its true form was that of a small monster.
It had undergone a sudden mutation after being exposed to dense miasmaーdriven to rage by pain and confusion.
When I cast a spell to suppress its pain and magical power, the imp returned to its original form. It clung to my leg with tears
streaming down its face.
Since it refused to leave my side, I began to grow attached to it. I gave it a name, and even formed a contract with it...but now,
it's nothing more than a pet.
The castle's servants adore it, and they often give it treats. It also serves as a great playmate for the children.
Regibalus...I thought of this name when I recalled the fierce battle with the immortal titan.
But, perhaps...it's an ill-fitting name for such an adorable little imp.

For some reason, the books lined up in this ancient-looking bookcase all look to be in brand new condition...
picks up a book filled with notes.
I founded a nation known as Zechres, and took the throne as Demon Lord.
I continued to postpone the invasion of Astoltia, and even now, I believe that was the right decision.
I've lived a long, long life, and I will soon die. I've done everything that I was meant to. I have no regrets.
However...there is one thing that I cannot let go of.
That is leaving Regibalus behind. Though my spell restored its original form, it remains an imp with the nature of an
immortal titan.
Possessing such overwhelming power, enduring an unending life must be painful... If it were up to me, I could grant it a
peaceful death.
"Will you pass on with me?" I asked. But Regibalus simply shook its head. It wished to stay with my descendants after
I am gone.
It wanted to protect them in my stead... When my little imp gave this answer, I could not hold back my tears...
When did I become so arrogant...thinking that I could impose death as a way to salvation?
My beloved familiar... May you be happy for all of eternity...
